page.title: 02MOVING TO MICKLEY
page.content:
I didn't really want to move to Mickley. I wouldn't know anyone and would have to change schools but on the first day I made friends. There are more things to do here and more children to play with. The people are very friendly. I lived in a big city and could not keep a dog but now I can. I like swimming in the river with my friends and dog. Mickley is nicer because there are no rough boys to pick on you. There are more places to play on roller skates and bikes. I like having riding lessons. I like living at Mickley and I wouldn't want to move.
{Rachel King Age 9}
